title: Service Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Developmental Disabilities Resource Center (Lakewood, CO) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: The first interview was with three people from upper management who took turns asking a series of questions, after I completed that process I was then given a word problem test with math questions, followed by a written test, and then a typing test. I was called back for a second interview where the same individuals asked additional questions and I signed some paper work giving them authority to call my references.
Interview Questions: What would I expect from a manager, what is something wrongful I did in a working situation, how would I handle a stressful day, what are my qualities and disqualifies

title: Vocational Instructor Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Developmental Disabilities Resource Center (Lakewood, CO) in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: Met with two managers for in person interview.  It was formal with a few questions and a review of the company mission. It was an easy interview that ended in a job offer.
Interview Questions: Tell us about a time you had to react quickly
